metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3514 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
When using a sync_repl client in 389-ds-base, an authenticated attacker can cause a NULL pointer dereference using a specially crafted query, causing a crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3514` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.4.11-2build1
389-ds-base - 1.4.4.11-2build1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.4.11-2build1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.4.11-2build1
python3-lib389 - 1.4.4.11-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.4.11-2build1').
